common.dbtIntro: is the first decentralized protocol based on the DeBox ecosystem.
common.dbtDIntro: stands for Destroy Building, which means destroying and building through fair and decentralized distribution of value generated by the ecosystem, running autonomously on the chain forever.
common.dbtBIntro: stands for Builders Reward, which means builders' rewards. Builders are the core of the ecosystem, creating value for the ecosystem while sharing the rewards generated by the ecosystem.
common.dbtTIntro: stands for Token Deflation, which means the destruction deflation mechanism. The unique destruction minting economic model of DBT helps to achieve rapid token deflation and sustainable growth of the ecosystem.
common.signatureRequired: Please sign the message to view subscription details
common.subscriptionSuccessDesc: Congratulations on successfully participating in the subscription
common.subscriptionFailedDesc: An error occurred during the subscription process
common.L0NotParticipate: L0 users cannot participate in the subscription
common.claimSuccessDesc: Congratulations on successfully claiming the rewards
common.claimFailedDesc: An error occurred during the claim process
common.recommendDesc2: After the invited friend completes the subscription, you can get the value of
common.mintSuccessDesc: Congratulations on successfully minting the NFT
common.mintFailedDesc: An error occurred during the minting process
